level.heading: DEFINITIONS (ยง 29-9499) Medicaid Provider/Supplier Application – The general orrovider/supplier-specific application developed by DHCF, and required tonitiate participation as a D.C. Medicaid provider or supplier. Disclosing Entity – A prospective or enrolled Medicaid provider orupplier (other than an individual practitioner or group of practitioners), or aiscal agent. Federal Health Care Program – Shall have the meaning ascribed in 42 U.S.C. 1320a-7b(f). In-District Applicants – Prospective Medicaid providers or suppliers thatre located inside of the District of Columbia Consolidated Metropolitantatistical Area, as defined by the United States Census Bureau. Out-of-District Applicants – Prospective Medicaid providers or suppliershat are located outside of the District of Columbia Consolidated Metropolitantatistical Area, as defined by the United States Census Bureau. Provider Agreement – Official enrollment document establishing roles,esponsibilities, and rights of a District Medicaid provider/supplier.
